## DefaultEventType type

The event types provided by default by `log-right`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DefaultEventType = "SUCCESS" | "DEBUG" | "INFO" | "WARNING" | "ERROR" | "EXCEPTION";
```
